analysis.Summary: Vue 3 single-file component that renders an SVG 'orders' icon. It exposes a 'fill' prop for color customization and forwards any CSS classes passed via attributes to the SVG paths.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable, customizable 'Orders' icon in the application UI following the project's icon conventions.

Components.name: IconOrders
Components.responsibility: Render an 80Ã—80 SVG graphic composed of two <path> elements representing an orders list icon; accept a 'fill' prop and arbitrary CSS classes.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Declare component props in <script setup> mode.

fill.description: SVG fill color, defaults to the CSS variable '--black'.

analysis.Usage: Import with `import IconOrders from 'modules/icons/entities/IconOrders.vue'` and include in a parent template as `<IconOrders fill="#ff0000" class="my-icon"/>`.
Notes: No <style> block; styling is handled via CSS variables and passed-in classes.
Relies on Vue 3 <script setup> syntax and automatic component naming.
Forwards all extra attributes to the <path> elements via `$attrs.class`.
